item.description:
No, seriously, Bruce Campbell is coming to New Haven to promote his new film, My Name is Bruce. For those of you who don't know who Bruce Campbell is or haven't seen Army of Darkness or Bubba Ho-Tep, I am very, very sorry for you. That being said, the new movie looks great, you can view the trailer here

As part of the promotion for the new film, Bruce will be at Criterion Cinemas to talk about the movie and have a Q&A period with the audience after. There are two showings on Wed. at which he will be available for questions, 7:30pm and 10pm.

I've already purchased my tickets for the 7:30 show online and would suggest doing the same for anyone interested in attending. I don't know if it'll sell out, but its better to be prepared. I'll be at theater prior to 7:30, will update an exact time in my RSVP next week.

And just remember...Good, Bad, I'm the guy with the gun.


Contact: Jeanie - 860-942-4708
item.name: Wed. - Meet Bruce Campbell!!!!
